channel.title: Error when i run server
channel.description:
when i log in my server i get this
Exception in "Thread-4"java.lang.NullpointerException at Class30_sub2_sub4_sub3.method454(class30_sub2_sub4_sub3.java:72) at client.method104(client.java:8005) at client.method146(client.java:11928) at client.method102(client.java:7706) at client.method9(client.java:8656) at Applet_sub1.run(Applet_sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4392) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: Error when i run server
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

KK so its probably delta with mopar or silab then.

Read full topic

item.title: Error when i run server
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Tatemo, post:3, topic:290392”]I think, that means you are using bluurs client with a server that isn’t configured for bluurs.

Or you are using a deltascape source with a silab or moparscape client.[/quote]The bluurs part is when it says error: refreshing connection and shtuff

Read full topic

item.title: Error when i run server
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

I think, that means you are using bluurs client with a server that isn’t configured for bluurs.

Or you are using a deltascape source with a silab or moparscape client.

Read full topic

item.title: Error when i run server
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

The only part I know about this is that it’s client sided. Maybe that might put you on the right track?

Read full topic
